territory.description: :ref:`territory` name or ID; send ``null`` if selected Country has no territories *(Farm Settings → Territory)*

unit.description: Temperature :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Farm Settings → Average Annual Temperature Unit)*

milk_production.description: Basic information about your herd's milk production

variety.description: Main breed. Note that if you have more than one breed you will need to select the most representative breed and adjust the default live weights to reflect your herd averages.

reporting_year.description: Choose a relevant start year for your 12 month reference period (the end year will be set automatically).

date_time.description: Choose the relevant start time for your start month (the end time will be set automatically).

date_month.description: Choose a relevant start month for your 12 month reference period (the end month will be set automatically).

protein_measure.description: True Protein Content or Crude Protein Content

value.description: :ref:`purchased_weight_value` count *(Inputs → Herd → Purchased animals → Live Weight)*

fertilisers.description: Basic information about your fertiliser application

type.description: :ref:`fertiliser-type` name or ID *(Inputs → Fertiliser → Fertiliser Type)*

production.description: :ref:`fertiliser-production-database` (Inputs → Fertiliser → Manufactured In). Note, no production emissions will be calculated for all digestates, slurries, manures and litter. However for these inputs a production type is required e.g. "World" for the API to be validated correctly.

value.description: :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Inputs → Fertiliser → Application Rate Value)*

unit.description: :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Inputs → Fertiliser → Application Rate Unit)*

application_date.description: Date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format or 'unknown' *(Inputs → Fertiliser → Application Date)*

custom_ingredients.description: Send this data only for 'Compose your own N/P/K' (``{}`` otherwise); you cannot customise the ingredients of built-in fertiliser types

n_total_percentage.description: Total of ammonia, urea and nitric percentages  *(Inputs → Fertiliser → %N)*

rate_measure.description: A :ref:`fertiliser-nutrient` ingredient, or '' / 'product' *(Inputs → Fertiliser → Fertiliser Weight or Unit)*

feed_components.description: Basic information about your feed component

certified.description: Deforestation-free (no land-use change for 20 years) *(Inputs → Feed → Certified)*.

unit.description: Weight :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Crop → Net Yield Unit)**

value.description: Emissions total calulated from crop_product/calculate endpoint

unit.description: Emissions in kg CO2e :ref:`unit` name or ID

certified.description: Deforestation-free (no land-use change for 20 years) *(Inputs → Feed → Certified)*

item.description: :ref:`feed-components-item` name or ID *(Inputs → Feed → Feed component)*

unit.description: :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Feed → Dry Matter Value)*
:ref:`unit` name or ID *(Feed → Fresh Weight Value)*

certified.description: Deforestation-free (no land-use change for 20 years) *(Inputs → Feed → Certified)*

unit.description: Weight :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Crop → Net Yield Unit)**

value.description: Emissions total calulated from crop_product/calculate endpoint

unit.description: Emissions in kg CO2e :ref:`unit` name or ID
:ref:`unit` name or ID *(Feed → Dry Matter Value)*

certified.description: Deforestation-free (no land-use change for 20 years) *(Inputs → Feed → Certified)*

feed_additives.description: Basic information about your feed additive

herd_section_percentage.description: :ref:`herd_section_percentage` value *(Inputs → Feed additives → Herd section percentage)*
:ref:`herd_section_percentage` value *(Inputs → Feed additives → Herd section percentage)*

direct_energy.description: Basic information about your direct energy use

unit.description: :ref:`unit` name or ID *(Fuel & Energy → Direct Energy → Energy Used Unit)*
